mapper.sql: select t1.*, t3.name province_name, t4.name city_name, t5.name district_name, (CASE WHEN (select count(0) from org WHERE pid = t1.id and deleted = 0)> 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) hasChildren from org t1 left join org t2 on t2.id = t1.pid and t2.deleted = 0 left join region t3 on t3.id = t1.province left join region t4 on t4.id = t1.city left join region t5 on t5.id = t1.district
